title: Advanced Presentation Speaking Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational presentation structuring and public speaking experience
context.additional_context: Enhanced personalized presentation practice through the use of smartphone-based learning tools.

learning_goals: Learners can produce three 10-minute advanced presentation videos within four weeks to logically convey social issues
Learners improve clarity, expression, and delivery skills by drafting self-assessment forms incorporating peer feedback
Learners perform a goal-setting-execution-reflection cycle weekly using SNS-based video creation tools (e.g., Adobe Spark)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
